text:
dEva# savitaqH pra su#va yaqj~jaM pra su#va yaqj~japa#tiqM BagA#ya diqvyO ga#ndhaqrvaH | 
kEqtaqpUH kEta#M naH punAtu vAqcaspatiq rvAca#maqdya sva#dAti naH ||
indra#syaq vajrO#&siq vArtra#GnaqstvayAq&yaM ~MvRuqtraM ~Mva#ddhyAt ||
vAja#syaq nu pra#saqvE mAqtara#M maqhImadi#tiqM nAmaq vaca#sA karAmahE | 
yasyA#miqdaM ~MviSvaqM Buva#namAviqvESaq tasyA$M nO dEqvaH sa#viqtA dharma# sAviShat || 
aqPsva# - [  ] 32
